languages.text: "Упокой {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g}..." {n}Абеляр осекается, несколько секунд смотрит на тело застывшим взглядом, а затем отворачивается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Упокой {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g}..." {n}Абеляр осекается, несколько секунд смотрит на тело застывшим взглядом, а затем отворачивается.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} grant her—" {n}Abelard stops short, staring at the body unblinkingly for a few seconds, before turning away.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Упокой {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g}..." {n}Абеляр осекается, несколько секунд смотрит на тело застывшим взглядом, а затем отворачивается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} grant her—" {n}Abelard stops short, staring at the body unblinkingly for a few seconds, before turning away.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “愿{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}庇佑她——”{n}阿贝拉德停下了脚步，眼睛一眨不眨地盯着尸体看了几秒钟，之后转身离开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} grant her—" {n}Abelard stops short, staring at the body unblinkingly for a few seconds, before turning away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “愿{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}庇佑她——”{n}阿贝拉德停下了脚步，眼睛一眨不眨地盯着尸体看了几秒钟，之后转身离开了。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} le conceda...». {n}Abelard se detiene, observando el cadáver sin pestañear durante unos segundos, y finalmente se marcha.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} grant her—" {n}Abelard stops short, staring at the body unblinkingly for a few seconds, before turning away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} le conceda...». {n}Abelard se detiene, observando el cadáver sin pestañear durante unos segundos, y finalmente se marcha.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}よ、彼女に…」{n}アベラルドは立ち止まり、数秒間彼女の死体を見つめてから背を向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} grant her—" {n}Abelard stops short, staring at the body unblinkingly for a few seconds, before turning away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}よ、彼女に…」{n}アベラルドは立ち止まり、数秒間彼女の死体を見つめてから背を向けた。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} schenke ihr ..." {n}Abelard hält inne und starrt einige Sekunden lang regungslos auf die Leiche, ehe er sich abwendet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} grant her—" {n}Abelard stops short, staring at the body unblinkingly for a few seconds, before turning away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} schenke ihr ..." {n}Abelard hält inne und starrt einige Sekunden lang regungslos auf die Leiche, ehe er sich abwendet.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Puisse l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} lui accorder... » {n}Abélard s'interrompt subitement, puis il contemple le cadavre sans ciller pendant quelques secondes avant de se détourner.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} grant her—" {n}Abelard stops short, staring at the body unblinkingly for a few seconds, before turning away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Puisse l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} lui accorder... » {n}Abélard s'interrompt subitement, puis il contemple le cadavre sans ciller pendant quelques secondes avant de se détourner.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} ona..." {n}Abelard, arkasını dönmeden önce sözünü yarıda kesip gözlerini kırpmadan cesede bakakalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} grant her—" {n}Abelard stops short, staring at the body unblinkingly for a few seconds, before turning away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}, ona..." {n}Abelard arkasını dönmeden önce sözünü yarıda kesip gözlerini kırpmadan bedene bakakalıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
